shortDescription: Before version 4.8.2, WordPress was vulnerable to a cross-site scripting attack via shortcodes in the TinyMCE visual editor.
vulnerabilityName: WordPress wordpress Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
